title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. III, subch. B, pt. 60, subpt. 60-2 - Supplementary Uninsured/underinsured Motorists Insurance
content:

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. III, subch. B, pt. 60, subpt. 60-2

Amended

New

York State Register November 28, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 48, eff. 11/28/2018

Statutory authority: Insurance Law, §§ 201, 301, 3420

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
